Text: Your Subscription to The Motley Fool Directfine day You have sent my heart soaring with news that you have agreed to receive some of this Fools earnestly penned electronic missives I hope you will find my correspondence entrancing but I shall be honest what these notes occasionally lack in charm they make up for in convenience and persistence The word passed along to me is that you have elected to receive the following notes FoolWatch Breakfast with the Fool Investing Basics Fresh Stuff Special Offers From The Motley Fool I shall do my best to make sure the letters are dispatched with both substance and speed Shall you ever change your mind and decide to select more notes or gasp fewer simply click the link below and you shall be transported to a page where you can change your choices communityfreemailemailenterhtm Looking forward to our pen pal relationship Foolishly Will Somers Chief JesterinResidence PS Twill be one day before your first letter arrives PPS If you believe that this email was sent to you in error perhaps by someone with careless fingers and you dont wish to receive these free newsletters please drop a note to

The Motley Fool Registrationa Registered Fool User Name benrogers Password RhumbaCelery Use this password or create your own but log in with this password first AMONG THE MANY BENEFITS OF BEING REGISTERED Ask any financial question you have Track your portfolio against the market Personalize your experience on the site TWO OTHER PLACES TO START A good introduction to all that we offer aboutsitenewfoolishwelcomehtm A list of this weeks content foolwatchfoolwatchhtm Finally if you run into any trouble drop an email to And the terms and conditions of being registered are covered in our Fools Rules helpfoolsruleshtm Have a great time out there David and Tom Gardner
